metadata.dc:author: Araújo, J
Carrillo de Albornoz, F
Martínez, E
Martín, A
García, D
Avalos, E
Romero, L
metadata.dc:description: We report a case of chondrosarcoma of the nasal cavity and paranasal sinuses. These cartilaginous tumors are rare in the head and neck. The treatment of choice is surgery.
metadata.dc:title: Condrosarcoma nasosinusal. A propósito de un caso.
[Paranasal sinus chondrosarcoma. A case report].
